Articles.Content: I was really looking forward to the tweakables, hoping to be able to connect shielded docking ports. Seeing as that isn't possible yet, I'm putting it here, as a suggestion for future development of the Tweakables system.
Tweakables are not finished yet, so hopefully this suggestion makes it into the next release, as it would be pretty cool

That's what I'm hoping
So as to start it opened, it'll be nice to have that option to start them docked with something that will be discarded/put into orbit during the mission/launch.

I blame vBulletin.

Might be kinda hard, as you'd have to tweak one of the two ports open before even placing it.

I agree though, it'd be nice.
IIRC, tweakables allows you to tweak the attributes of ghost parts (ones that you've dropped around without having attached them to the ship), so it is still pretty easy to do.
I agree that this would be nice. As it stands, I've all but abandoned use of the shielded ports because I almost always want to launch them with something already docked.
